H0.text: Hair is a fiber that is found only in mammals.

H1.text: Muscle is a fiber that is found only in mammals.

H2.text: Feathers are a fiber that is found only in mammals.

A3.text: Hair is one of the defining characteristics of mammals.

A4.text: Hair has its origins in the common ancestor of mammals, the synapsids, about 300 million years ago.

A5.text: No animals other than mammals have hair.

A6.text: Other animals have features such as whiskers, feathers, setae, or cilia that superficially resemble it
